001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.TypeConstants;
011
012import java.time.temporal.TemporalAmount;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * An atomic Metapath item representing a duration data value.
018 * <p>
019 * This interface supports both day-time and year-month duration formats
020 * following the ISO 8601 standard. Examples of valid durations include:
021 * <ul>
022 * <li>P1Y2M (1 year, 2 months)</li>
023 * <li>P3DT4H5M (3 days, 4 hours, 5 minutes)</li>
024 * </ul>
025 *
026 * @see IDayTimeDurationItem
027 * @see IYearMonthDurationItem
028 */
029public interface IDurationItem extends IAnyAtomicItem {
030  /**
031   * Get the type information for this item.
032   *
033   * @return the type information
034   */
035  @NonNull
036  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IDurationItem> type() {
037    return TypeConstants.DURATION_TYPE;
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
042   *
043   * @param item
044   *          the item to cast
045   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
046   *         cast to this type
047   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
048   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
049   */
050  @NonNull
051  static IDurationItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
052    IDurationItem retval;
053    if (item instanceof IDurationItem) {
054      retval = (IDurationItem) item;
055    } else {
056      String value;
057      try {
058        value = item.asString();
059      } catch (IllegalStateException ex) {
060        // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
061        throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
062      }
063
064      try {
065        retval = IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(value);
066      } catch (IllegalStateException ex) {
067        try {
068          retval = IYearMonthDurationItem.valueOf(value);
069        } catch (IllegalStateException ex2) {
070          InvalidValueForCastFunctionException newEx = new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(
071              String.format("Value '%s' cannot be parsed as either a day-time or year-month duration", value),
072              ex2);
073          newEx.addSuppressed(ex);
074          throw newEx; // NOPMD context as suppressed
075        }
076      }
077    }
078    return retval;
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  TemporalAmount getValue();
083
084  @Override
085  default IDurationItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
086    return cast(item);
087  }
088}
